ByteArrayOutputStream Class Reference

A specialized gaia::storage::OutputStream for class for writing content to an (internal) byte array. More...

#include <ByteArrayOutputStream.h>

Detailed Description

A specialized gaia::storage::OutputStream for class for writing content to an (internal) byte array.

As bytes are written to this stream, the byte array may be expanded to hold more bytes. When the writing is considered to be finished, a copy of the byte array can be requested from the class.

The following example demonstrates how to use this ByteArrayOutputStream class.

 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState) {
     gaia::base::String fileString("This is ByteArrayOutputStream test.");
     ByteArrayOutputStream* baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
     gaia::storage::BufferedOutputStream* os =
                 new gaia::storage::BufferedOutputStream(*baos, 600);
     os->write(fileString->getBytes(), 0, 500);
     os->flush();
     os->close();
     baos->close();
 }
